frontmatter.title: FluxNews
frontmatter.meta_description: FluxNews is complete app that fully integration Wordpress website

markdownRemark.html:
Open common/config.dart and control the visibility of the SmartChat feature from:

const SmartChat = [
  { 'app': 'firebase', "email": 'admininspireui@gmail.com', "color": 'ff1122', "icon": "whatsapp"},
  { 'app': 'line', "phone": '84989908854', "color": 'ff1122'},
  { 'app': 'whatsapp', "phone": '84989908854', "color": '#ff1122'},
];

The first option is using the Firebase, follow these steps for the config

  1. Using the Firebase Console, add an Android app to your project: Follow the assistant, download the generated google-services.json file and place it inside android/app
  2. Using the Firebase Console, add an iOS app to your project: Follow the assistant, download the generated GoogleService-Info.plist file, open ios/Runner.xcworkspace with Xcode, and within Xcode place the file inside ios/Runner.

List of support chat app: line, whatsapp….
